message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly exceptional. Let's meet in the middle - I'm willing to come down to $1,225,000.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be more aggressive on the price. I'm willing to go up to $1,150,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle from here.
